name: Jet Warbird Training Center
about: The Jet Warbird Training Center, located in Santa Fe, New Mexico, specializes in training civilian pilots in the safe operation of jet warbirds. With a fleet that includes the L-29, L-39, T-33, Fouga, and MIG 15, the center offers a range of training programs such as jet warbird type ratings, upset recovery training, jet transition training, and pre-jet aerobatic courses. Having trained hundreds of pilots, the center prides itself on its impeccable safety record. Courses include jet orientation flights and comprehensive training packages, making it an ideal destination for pilots looking to transition to jet aircraft or experience the thrill of flying historic jets. The Jet Warbird Training Center is dedicated to providing high-quality, hands-on training experiences.
